summary: New enhanced texture for the Magnus Staff
descriptionHtml:
This mod will modify the look of the staff of Magnus:

[u] What are the changes? [/u]
- the texture file is now 1024x1024 px instead of 512x512 px, so the details were greatly improved.
- The vanilla staff has a poor low quality texture; in fact only the mesh gives a good look to this staff. So I decided to enhance it by mixing 2 new textures for the staff and I modified the \"eye of magnus\" texture to enhance the staff\'s orb (so it is not a \"disco ball\" anymore).
Now, the staff is less bright too and is more colorfull.

[u] How do I instal this? [/u]
-download and extract the .7z file on your desktop
-drag the \"textures\" folder into your \"skyrim\\data\" folder

[b] ALH [/b]
[line]

[color=lightblue]Featured in Skyrim Mod Sanctuary : 2012 Anniversary Edition[/color]

[youtube]lSkMDG274cM[/youtube]
[line]

author: ALH
